full_text:
Form No.54
Order of Acquittal of accused on compounding offences out of court under
Sec.320(8)Cr.P.C.
Proceedings of the Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate,
Thiruvananthapuram.
Present: Elsa Catherine George
Additional Chief Judicial Magistrate.
Thursday the 27" day of February 2025
CC: 1883/2018
Complainant: State represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Pettah Police Station in Crime No. 1250/2018
(By A.P.P. )
Accused: A1 Shiju Thampi, 27 years, S/o Thampi, Sheela
Nivas, T.C 76/2179, Vadakkevilakam,
Oolankuzhi, Anayara, Kadakampally Village.
A2 Shyju Thampi, 27 years, S/o Thampi, Sheela
Nivas, T.C 76/2179, Vadakkevilakam,
Oolankuzhi, Anayara, Kadakampally Village.
A3 Amal Babu, 21 years, S/o Babu, Kizhakkethil
Veedu, T.C 76/2122, Oolankuzhi, Kadakampally
Village.
A4 Suji, 36 years, S/o Sivapalan, Kunnuvila Veedu,
T.C 76/394, ARA 358, Near Kizhakkethil
Junction, Anayara, Kadakampally Village.
(By Adv. Sri. V Prathap Chandran. )
Offence: Punishable u/s 341, 323, 506(i) r/w 34 of IPC
ORDER
The offence having been compounded out of court/with the permission of
court accused are acquitted U/s.320(8) Cr.P.C.

. 4
